configuration_json.formula: if (actual_value >= threshold) then success_value else failure_value

schema.description: Binary threshold scoring for: Limit added sugar to no more than two servings - any food or drink with about 8–12g of added sugar (...

metadata.recommendation_text: Limit added sugar to no more than two servings - any food or drink with about 8–12g of added sugar (e.g., 1 cookie, sweetened yogurt, granola bar, or can of soda) per week
